game_description: In BeFootball - SuperPlayer full version, football fans will be able to participate in a frenetic game of stopping penalties or heading balls, being the super stars of the beautiful game and achieving success thanks to their shooting or stopping skills, speed, power, precision ... to reach the maximum score and come out victorious. Welcome a frenetic soccer virtual reality experience to test your best moves and sports skills while being in a breath-taking stadium. Featured in the DEMO version: - Goalkeeper Mode: become a goalkeeper and stop as many balls as possible - Header Mode: become a striker and head the ball to hit the scoring panels and test your header accuracy. Get ready for the match! Full game coming soon, with: - New Keeper game modes - New Kicker game modes - New Rhythm Fitness mode - More stadiums - More challenges - And more ...
review_1: Really fun game and can be very fun and satisfying when you get a great save.
review_3: Loved the demo and can't wait for the full version. i'd like loads of different challanges in the full game and an option to play against your mates. so much potential
review_4: Ok so this game obviously takes inspiration from a very good game on psvr called headmasters. Graphically this is better but what made that game was the brilliant modes. Like the party game mode with the dartboard or the fairground mode and the different environments. If this game can provide those sort of modes then it will be a winner for sure. So fingers crossed. In terms of physics the heading is fine and goes where I want it. The keeper I didn’t like the ball going through my body. I felt that as a keeper you catch it with your hands and body at same time. With the call going through your body it didn’t seem right. So good demo but what will make this game is the fun modes - If there are some
review_5: Woooow I'm football player i can say this could be huge game we all waiting for , until we get the full version hope this will be soon
